featured.title: The tools list
featured.description: A modern, SEO-optimized marketing site built with Next.js 14 that showcases curated lists of the best tools across different categories.

featured.title: Quickfounder
featured.description: QuickFounder is a modern boilerplate platform that helps developers and founders launch SaaS or marketplace apps in days. It comes with authentication, payments, database integration, and a ready landing page so you can focus on building your idea instead of setup.

featured.title: The Met Museum
featured.description: A modern landing page for The Met Museum.
